item.title: Please help pleasde i need help so badd
item.dc:creator: @Solid_snake1 Solid snake
item.description:
@Solid_snake1 wrote:

ok on my server its just like dodain rats drop iron druids mith but i wanna switch drops to iron to mystic and so on when i look at npc drops folder all there is is this
public class NPCDrops {
public int npcId;
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}

Read full topic
item.source: Please help pleasde i need help so badd
